name: AI-Powered Cloud Automation with Generative AI
desc: Improved AI-driven product recommendations by 40% using Claude 3 Sonnet (Amazon Bedrock). Automated 80% of customer interactions, including order cancellations and support inquiries, by integrating OpenAI GPT-4o. Extracted actionable insights from 10K+ customer reviews using Azure AI Text Analytics.

name: MultiCloud DevOps & CI/CD Automation
desc: Migrated the CloudMart eCommerce app to AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure. Accelerated deployment speed by 60% using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform and automated CI/CD pipelines. Orchestrated containerized microservices on Kubernetes (EKS) & EC2, implementing auto-scaling and real-time data synchronization.

name: Multilingual Medical Chatbot
desc: Fine-tuned LLaMA 7B with LoRA, improving medical query accuracy by 63% and terminology comprehension by 58%. Enhanced multilingual support and optimized training efficiency on Google Colab using NVIDIA CUDA on an A100 GPU.

name: PageTurners E-Commerce
desc: Developed PageTurners with ASP .NET Core MVC (.NET 8) on Azure web apps, integrating Entity Framework for CRUD operations and Stripe for secure payments. Designed a responsive UI with Bootstrap v5 and implemented the Repository Pattern, reducing configuration time by 30%.

name: Budget Buddy (Expense Tracker)
desc: Built and deployed Budget Buddy, an expense-tracking app using ASP.NET Core MVC and Syncfusion on Azure. Optimized database performance with Entity Framework for a 25% speed improvement and boosted engagement by 40% with interactive data visualizations.

name: Movie Suggestion System
desc: Developed a movie recommendation system using Apriori, FP-Growth, and K-means clustering techniques in Python. Implemented as part of an undergraduate course project to provide personalized movie suggestions based on user preferences.

name: RTO Conceptual Web App
desc: Created an ASP.NET web application using C# and ADO.NET for the Regional Transport Office. Enabled seamless vehicle registration, automatic number generation, and driver's license services to streamline the process.

name: Fabric Microscopy Analysis
desc: Implemented a CNN deep-learning model for fabric microscopy, achieving 96% accuracy in identifying textile fibers and silk purity. Developed as part of a research project during an internship at Titan.

name: Point-to-Point Measurement for Prosthetics
desc: Developed a model for point-to-point distance measurements using OpenCV for manufacturing prosthetic legs with 0.05 precision, improving accuracy in prosthetic production.

name: Roll Bonding Process Simulation
desc: Designed a C++ program to assess displacement, stress, and strain within the roll bonding process, reducing experimental trials by 70%. Conducted during a research internship at IIT Madras.

name: DigiMon Dashboard
desc: Developed a financial dashboard with features for loans, withdrawals, and transactions, enhancing user engagement by 30% through optimized UI/UX.
